AI Description: Shasta is a long-read assembler designed for PacBio and Oxford Nanopore data. It efficiently assembles long noisy reads into highly accurate contigs and is optimized for high error rates commonly found in third-generation sequencing technologies.
Core Features: Optimized For Long Noisy Reads From Pacbio & Oxford Nanopore Technologies, Efficiently Assembles Highly Accurate Contigs, Handles High Error Rates Commonly Found In Third-Generation Sequencing Data
